mapper.insert: insert into total_price_promotion (`id`, threshold, begin_time, end_time, operator, voucher_amount, remark) values (#{id}, #{threshold}, #{beginTime}, #{endTime}, #{operator}, #{voucherAmount}, #{remark})

insert into total_price_promotion_content (`id`, total_price_promotion_id, pid, quantity, unit_price, total_price, remark) values
(#{item.id}, #{item.totalPricePromotionId}, #{item.pid}, #{item.quantity}, #{item.unitPrice}, #{item.totalPrice}, #{item.remark})
mapper.select: select * from total_price_promotion order by `id` limit 0, 1
select * from total_price_promotion where threshold <= #{rawTotalAmount} and #{today} between begin_time and end_time order by voucher_amount desc limit 0, 1
